description: T1 - Hawthorn (Crataegus monogyna) - Sever Ivy at base, up to 2m. Remove Ivy from crown and reduce by approx. 2m all round. Final height 5m and spread 4m. T2 - Pittosporum - Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1m (30% volume) Final height 3.5m and spread 2.5mT3 - Fusia - Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1m (25% volume) Final height 3m and spread 3m.T4 - Larger Bay (Laurus nobilis) - Reduce by 3-4m back to most previous reduction points. Ensure 1m (30% volume) clear of play house. Final height 6.5m and sprea 4.5mT5 - Smaller Bay (Laurus nobilis) - Crown Reduction - Reducing mainly the spread of the tree furthest from house by up to 2m, and some height to shape. Remove minor stems and branches on building side of tree. Ensure 1m clear of play house (25-30%) volume. Final height 4.5m and spread 4m.T6 Holm Oak - Evergreen Oak (Quercus ilex) Crown Reduction - Remove lowest two limbs at 3m and 3.25 to west. Reduce the height and spread of the remaining tree by up to 3m (30-35% volume). Final height 10m and spread 6m.T7 Mullberry (Morus spp) Reduce by 1m below the most previous reduction points (35-40% volume) Final height 7m and spread 6m.
